description: Retrieves details about an enabled control. For usage examples, see the Controls Reference Guide.

parameters.name: enabledControlIdentifier
parameters.description: The controlIdentifier of the enabled control.

nested_items.name: enabledControlDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the enabled control.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the enabled control.

nested_items.name: controlIdentifier
nested_items.description: The control identifier of the enabled control. For information on how to find the controlIdentifier, see the overview page.

nested_items.name: driftStatusSummary
nested_items.description: The drift status of the enabled control.

nested_items.name: driftStatus
nested_items.description: The drift status of the enabled control.
DRIFTED: The enabledControl deployed in this configuration doesn't match the configuration that Amazon Web Services Control Tower expected.
IN_SYNC: The enabledControl deployed in this configuration matches the configuration that Amazon Web Services Control Tower expected.
NOT_CHECKING: Amazon Web Services Control Tower does not check drift for this enabled control. Drift is not supported for the control type.
UNKNOWN: Amazon Web Services Control Tower is not able to check the drift status for the enabled control.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: Array of EnabledControlParameter objects.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of a key/value pair.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of a key/value pair.

nested_items.name: statusSummary
nested_items.description: The deployment summary of the enabled control.

nested_items.name: lastOperationIdentifier
nested_items.description: The last operation identifier for the enabled resource.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The deployment status of the enabled resource.
SUCCEEDED: The EnabledControl or EnabledBaseline configuration was deployed successfully.
UNDER_CHANGE: The EnabledControl or EnabledBaseline configuration is changing.
FAILED: The EnabledControl or EnabledBaseline configuration failed to deploy.

nested_items.name: targetIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ARN of the organizational unit. For information on how to find the targetIdentifier, see the overview page.

nested_items.name: targetRegions
nested_items.description: Target Amazon Web Services Regions for the enabled control.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.
